title: Say Goodbye to HBO Porn - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 08.29.18
description:
Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/morning

Greg and Nick talk about The Rock’s new movie, the Dream Daddy comic book, and bid a fond farewell to soft-core porn on HBO.

-Dwayne Johnson to play hawaiian King in Epic from Robert Zemeckis (30:55 mins)
-Ballers spoilers (34:40 mins)
-Video Game Dream Daddy launches surprise comic book series (40:26 mins)
-Star Wars: Episode IX will reportedly see the return of Heroes Greg Grunberg (42:15 mins)
-HBO just scrapped its adult programming, but at least we still have game of thrones nudity (46:52 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
